name: Ofe Akwu
description: A rich palm fruit stew commonly served with rice.

name: Fufu and Oha Soup
description: Traditional soup made with oha leaves and assorted meats.

name: Ukwa
description: Nutritious porridge made from African breadfruit.

name: Nkwobi
description: Spicy cow foot delicacy served in thick palm oil sauce.

name: Abacha
description: Popularly called African salad, made from shredded cassava.

name: Egusi Soup
description: Savory soup made with ground melon seeds and vegetables.

name: Ofe Nsala
description: A light, peppery white soup made without oil.

name: Ogbono Soup
description: Draw soup made with ground ogbono seeds and meat.

name: Jollof Rice
description: Beloved rice dish spiced and cooked in tomato sauce.

name: Moi Moi
description: Steamed bean pudding seasoned with spices and proteins.

name: Pepper Soup
description: Hot spicy soup known for its medicinal properties.

name: Akara
description: Deep-fried bean cakes often served with pap.
